solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int[][] matrixReshape(int[][] nums, int r, int c) {--newline--        int n = nums.length, m = nums[0].length;--newline--        if (r*c != n*m) return nums;--newline--        int[][] res = new int[r][c];--newline--        for (int i=0;i<r*c;i++) --newline--            res[i/c][i%c] = nums[i/m][i%m];--newline--        return res;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
